Instance.description: Compound situation goal. Depending on the Evaluation Mode tunable, this can pass if either (a) any sub goals pass, or (b) all sub goals pass

TunableVariant.name: evaluation_mode
TunableVariant.description: Determines how progress of the compound goal is tracked. Any - Compound goal completes when any sub-goals complete. All - Compound goal completes when all sub-goals complete.

TunableTuple.name: all
TunableTuple.description: Evaluation mode where a compound goal is completed if all of its sub-goals are completed.

TunableTuple.name: any
TunableTuple.description: Evaluation mode where a compound goal is completed if any of its sub-goals are completed.

TunableList.name: situation_goals
TunableList.description: If any of the situation goal passes this situation goal will pass too.

Tunable.description: If this situation goal passes, pass this compound one.
